definition: Sanjiang ecological tourist area in Wenchuan county 汶川县, northwest Sichuan
pinyin: San1 jiang1 sheng1 tai4 lu:3 you2 qu1
Shi4 jie4 Lu:3 you2 Zu3 zhi1
guo2 jia1 lu:3 you2 du4 jia4 qu1
Wen2 hua4 he2 Lu:3 you2 bu4

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap

sentences.english: I was a graduate of Guangzhou Vocational Middle School of Tourism.
sentences.chinese: 我是廣州旅遊職業中學畢業生。

sentences.english: This will launch XCOR into the emerging space tourism market, estimated at over a half-billion dollars.
sentences.chinese: 公司將投資超過五億美金，來拓展空間旅遊市場。

sentences.english: Andrew's face fell when he was told he couldn' t go on the trip.
sentences.chinese: 安德魯聽說他不能去旅遊時臉沉了下來。

sentences.english: The guide misled the tourists in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 嚮導在森林裏給旅遊者帶錯了路。

sentences.english: It's a tourist place of attraction.
The bright young man can get ahead quickly in the tourist industry.
sentences.chinese: 這位聰明的年輕人在旅遊業界很快獲得成功。

sentences.english: Among all the bridges, the most popular among tourists are the hanging bridges.
sentences.chinese: 在所有的橋中，最受旅遊者歡迎的就是繩索吊橋。

sentences.english: Meg graduated from Taiwan's Ming-Chuan College with a BA degree in Tourism Management.
sentences.chinese: 吳湘玲畢業於臺灣銘傳大學，獲旅遊管理學士學位。

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: How much does the all-day tour cost?
sentences.chinese: 整天的旅遊費要多少錢？

sentences.english: The cost for the trip was halved by us.
sentences.chinese: 我們均攤了那次旅遊的費用。

sentences.english: Zhenjiang, China's focus on the development of tourism cities.
sentences.chinese: 鎮江是我國重點發展的旅遊城市之一。

sentences.english: Heir to an industrial past, the region has turned towards tourism.
sentences.chinese: 曾經工業的繼承者，而如今這裏已轉向旅遊業。

sentences.english: This paper examines a new concept of community-based tourism(CBET) that originated in foreign country.
sentences.chinese: 本文引入了國外基於社區的生態旅遊這一新發展理念。

sentences.english: From the above question, why do you consider Antarctica as your tourist destination?
sentences.chinese: 承上題，爲什麼會考慮選擇南極作爲旅遊景點？

sentences.english: Its citizens will also be allowed to travel visa-free in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 土耳其公民也被允許免籤前往歐洲旅遊。

definition: to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
